Finally after close 2 weeks of the movie coming out is available in a nice possible cam as usual this movie and the curiosity about this one was great enough after reading the basic storyline .

Don't Be Afraid of the Dark is a 2011 American horror film written by Matthew Robbins and Guillermo del Toro and directed by comic book artist Troy Nixey. The film stars Guy Pearce, Bailee Madison, and Katie Holmes, as a man, his daughter, and his girlfriend moving into a 19th century Rhode Island mansion, where his withdrawn daughter begins to witness malevolent goblin-like creatures that emerge from a sealed ash pit in the basement of the house. It is a remake of the 1973 ABC made-for-television horror film of the same name that starred Kim Darby.

SO , for who likes nice horror films certainly ok to watch this one and a last appointment to the general good rank of this movie on the 1st 2 weeks on US movie charts .

Enjoy and happy movie to all of you .
